sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: SleepMix ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share your information when you use our mobile application and related services.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We may collect the following personal information when you use our app:

sections.title: How We Collect Data
sections.content: We collect information in several ways:
items: Directly from you when you provide it
Automatically through the app while you use it
From third-party services with your consent
